name: Oxygen Is Needed
description:
You're a brave red blood cell, that exit from alveoli with brand new oxygen that must be transported with you to brain. There is a problem, the body have an infection. Fight off enemies with your red dots shooting weapon. Be quick, the brain can last only 5 minutes wihout oxygen!

Controls:

WASD - walk

space - shoot

r - restart level

Credits:

All - wister808
